subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks and the Boston Celtics were once great rivals. But today’s Knicks are 4-9, and in no shape to stoke a new rivalry with a new Celtics powerhouse.
snippet: The Knicks and the Boston Celtics were once great rivals. But today’s Knicks are 4-9, and in no shape to stoke a new rivalry with a new Celtics powerhouse.
